short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See when you receive inbox notifications from StackOverflow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Want to know when you have new inbox notifications from StackOverflow? This extension adds a browser action to your toolbar, and updates the badge text when you have new notifications.
